Reusing Ontologies as a Whole. 
Domain Ontology Select
gy
The question here is: Which ones are the best?
 Good documentation of the ontology.
 Ontology is good modularized.
 Integration effort is low.
 Ontology is reused by others
 Ontology is reused by others.
 If the ontology used naming conventions.
 If the ontology have been evaluated.
